hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: product
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please enter the product being built

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please enter the branch used for the build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: revision
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please enter the revision being built

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /opt/builder/rathan #python usetinydb.py -p=SPS -b=feature -t=CI getval #python usetinydb.py -p=SPS -b=feature -t=CI -r=345678 update
python usetinydb.py -p=${product} -b=${branch} -t=${buildtype} -r=${revision} update
echo "Updated tinydb with the build details successfully"
